disc_jockey_revive.screen.blocks.title: Blocks
disc_jockey_revive.screen.drop_hint: Drag and drop song files into this window to add them
disc_jockey_revive.screen.drop_confirm: Do you want to add the following songs to Disc Jockey?
disc_jockey_revive.player.invalid_note_b: The Note Blocks near you are not in the correct configuration. Missing:
disc_jockey_revive.instrument_info: This maps instruments to be played by noteblocks for a different instrument instead.
disc_jockey_revive.warning:
WARNING!!! This mod is very likely to get false flagged as hacks, please contact a server administrator before using this mod! (You can disable this warning in the mod settings)
The current version is an unofficial version, revised by BRanulf
For learning reference only, please support the official, don't contact me XD
text.autoconfig.disc_jockey_revive.title: Disc Jockey
text.autoconfig.disc_jockey_revive.optio: Will force notes to play synchronously with client ticks instead of in a separate thread.
This can lead to performance loss, especially when you client has low or inconsistent fps but can fix issues when playback does not happen at all.
Makes all note block sounds when playing a song omnidirectional, creating a more pleasing listening experience
If you don't know what that means, I recommend you just try it and hear the difference
Select the server version, you expect this mod to be used on.
This affects how reachable NoteBlocks are determined.
Selecting the wrong version could cause you not to be able to play some distant note blocks which could break/worsen playback
If you're unsure, or play on many different server versions and don't mind not reaching every possible note block, select "All"
Delays playback for specified seconds, after tuning finished, if any (e.g. 0.5 for half a second delay).
